transform_def.name: designed07
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) l = lerp(p_in.y, p_in.x, length(p_in) / fourpi() * abs(cos(p_in.x))) c = lerp(abs(p_in.x), abs(p_in.y), length(p_in)) * abs(cos(l)) - length(p_in) z = abs(sin(p_in.x) * tan(l * c) / cos(l)) con1 = z < r con2 = z > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
